result.title: How to create This Kind Of Sudoku ...
result.content: HI ... Could you help me in the following question ?! I want to have a sudoko, But there is a new condition, that is for every 4 cells that form "L", numbers in them should be pairwise different ! Have you such a table or an algorithm that give me this table ?! And also i want a random one, not a table with a simple pattern ...
